data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skelton, Paul H., Swartz, Ernst R., Vreven, Emmanuel J. (2018): The identity of Barbus capensis Smith, 1841 and the generic status of southern African tetraploid cyprinids (Teleostei, Cyprinidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 410: 1-29, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.410|3 occurrences
